Quotes.Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.Quote: Don't believe everything you read on the internet.

Quotes.Author: Italian Proverb
Quotes.Quote: After the game, the king and the pawn go into the same box.

Quotes.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotes.Quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.

Quotes.Author: T.S Eliot
Quotes.Quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

Quotes.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quotes.Quote: There is no passion to be found playing small ― in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

Quotes.Author: Walt Whitman
Quotes.Quote: Do I contradict myself? Very well, then, I contradict myself; I am large ― I contain multitudes.

Quotes.Author: Oscar Wilde
Quotes.Quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

Quotes.Author: Gertrude Stein
Quotes.Quote: Everybody knows if you are too careful you are so occupied in being careful that you are sure to stumble over something.

Quotes.Author: Boris Pasternak
Quotes.Quote: Man is born to live, not to prepare for life.

Quotes.Author: Sigmund Freud
Quotes.Quote: Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility, and most people are frightened of responsibility.

Quotes.Author: Siddhārtha Gautama Buddha
Quotes.Quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think, we become.

Quotes.Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quotes.Quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don’t hide the madness.

Quotes.Author: Golda Meir
Quotes.Quote: Those who do not know how to weep with their whole heart don’t know how to laugh either.

Quotes.Author: Carl Sagan
Quotes.Quote: Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality.
